title.rendered: Tanner Tomlinson: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Tanner Tomlinson
    • Early Life
    • Professional Career
  • Tanner Tomlinson’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
    • Endorsements
  • Personal Details

    • Career Stats
    • FAQs About Tanner Tomlinson
  • Wrapping Up: Tanner Tomlinson’s Net Worth

Tanner Tomlinson, a name that has become synonymous with the world of rodeo, particularly in the National Finals Rodeo (NFR). This young cowboy has made a significant impact in the sport, demonstrating exceptional talent and dedication.

Here we have Tanner Tominson’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, relationship status, and more.

About Tanner Tomlinson

Tanner Tomlinson hails from Angleton, Texas, and has made a name for himself in the world of rodeo. He is the son of Steve and Liz, and he has an older brother named Justin. 

Tanner’s family has been a significant influence on his career, providing him with the support and encouragement needed to excel in the demanding world of rodeo.

Early Life

Tanner’s early life was steeped in the culture of rodeo. Growing up in Texas, a state known for its rich rodeo history, Tanner was exposed to the sport at a young age. His family’s involvement in rodeo undoubtedly played a significant role in shaping his interest and passion for the sport.

Professional Career

Tanner’s professional career took off when he was crowned the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association’s Rookie of the Year in 2020. He then teamed up with two-time world champion heeler Patrick Smith in 2021, and the duo has since made a significant impact in the rodeo world. 

In 2022, Tanner and Patrick set the NFR team roping aggregate record with a time of 53.00 seconds on 10 head. Tanner’s exceptional talent and dedication have earned him a reputation as a game-changer in the sport.

Tanner Tomlinson’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Tanner Tomlinson’s net worth is estimated to be $7 million.

This figure includes his earnings from his career as a professional rodeo contestant, where he has achieved significant success. For instance, his career earnings as of October 2023 were reported to be $370,611. Tomlinson was crowned the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association’s Rookie of the Year in 2020.

Career Earnings

The specific details of Tanner Tomlinson’s salary are not publicly available. However, his earnings from the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) and other rodeo events contribute significantly to his income.

In 2022, he was ranked 6th in the world standings with $104,251.04 in PRCA earnings per man. His earnings from the 2022 Wrangler NFR were $199,727.

In 2022, Tanner Tomlinson was ranked 5th and 6th in the world standings with $104,251.04 in PRCA earnings per man.

Tomlinson’s career earnings:

Endorsements

Tomlinson has an endorsement deal with Lone Star Ropes, a company that specializes in producing high-quality ropes for rodeo sports.

On their website, they feature a section where fans can shop for Tanner Tomlinson’s gear, which includes the ropes he uses in his competitions. This endorsement reflects Tanner’s status as a top performer in the rodeo world and his influence in the sport.

Personal Details

Girlfriend

Tomlinson appears to be single. He prefers to keep his private life away from the spotlight.

How old is he?

As of 2023, he is 22 years old.

Height and Weight

Tomlinson stands at a height of 6’0″ and weighs approximately 165 lbs.

What is his nationality?

He is American.

Career Stats

  • As of 2023, Tanner Tomlinson’s career earnings amount to $370,611.
  • In 2022, he ranked 2nd in the world standings and 1st in the Wrangler NFR standings.
  • His earnings from the 2022 Wrangler NFR were $199,727.
  • In the same year, he and his partner Patrick Smith set the NFR team roping aggregate record with a time of 53.00 seconds on 10 head.
  • Tanner won the 2020 Resistol Rookie of the Year as the best team roping header in their first full year of competition.
  • In 2022, he was ranked 5th and 6th in the world standings with $104,251.04 in PRCA earnings per man.

FAQs About Tanner Tomlinson

Where is Tanner Tomlinson from?

Tanner Tomlinson is from Angleton, Texas.

What is Tanner Tomlinson’s net worth in 2023?

His net worth in 2023 is estimated to be $7 million.

Who is his professional partner in rodeo?

His professional partner in rodeo is two-time world champion heeler Patrick Smith.

What record did he set in 2022?

In 2022, Tomlinson and Patrick Smith set the NFR team roping aggregate record with a time of 53.00 seconds on 10 head.

Wrapping Up: Tanner Tomlinson’s Net Worth

Tanner Tomlinson is a rising star in the world of rodeo. His exceptional talent, dedication, and passion for the sport have earned him a place among the top competitors in the NFR. With a promising career ahead, Tanner Tomlinson is undoubtedly a name to watch in the rodeo world. He has accumulated a net worth of $7 million.
